attributes.comment:
As a parent in the process of international adoption (from Guatemala), I know the
great expense involved. I have also endured the long waiting time for governments
of both countrys to approve application, approve paperwork, etc. This process is
not easy, far from it, but could be made easier if the expense was not so great.
Now, there is a proposed fee increase. This is ridiculous! Unless you plan to
increase employment which will make our waiting time for approval MUCH shorter,
there should not be a fee increase. Consider what you are doing! This is a step
that MANY parents much go through twice, due to the fact that international
adoptions are taking longer and expiring 171Hs. It is completely unfair to us all!! If
you must increase the fee (which I know you don't, but I'm willing to give the
benefit of the doubt), make sure that this part of our process will speed up....speed
up by a great deal of time!

Thank you!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Terry Bracey
